group_1.textLeft: …And there you have it.

group_1.textRight: [chara:833900:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Amazing!@It's authentic Mongolian writing!

group_1.textLeft: Even the Mongolian alphabet itself is from@a different country.
It seems the Mongolians have imported it@and are adapting it into their own style.

group_1.textRight: You're very knowledgable… As expected from@the Order of the White Hill's Mongolian expert.

group_1.textLeft: No, I just read a detailed explanation@in a manuscript I received...that's all.

group_1.textRight: Huh, I didn't know writings like that existed.

group_1.textLeft: No, it's nothing like that.

group_1.textRight: Pardon?

group_1.textLeft: It was written by the Lama himself anyway.@Just what was that manuscript, really…?

group_1.textRight: I don't really get it, but…@you mind if I take this?
Our letter of negotiation to Mongolia…

group_1.textLeft: I know you came out all this way,@but I'll deliver it myself.
I've been summoned by the temple's@Head Priest.
You refer to Heruka?

group_1.textRight: Yes. Both of you trained at the same nunnery@before you came to us, yes?
…With Lama Heruka, I mean.

group_1.textLeft: We didn't really train together per se.
Our nunnery was simply a shelter for orphaned@children.
There wasn't really anything special@or unique occurring there.

group_1.textRight: Yes…and yet the Master has successfully@transmitted her teachings to Mongolia,
thus significantly delaying the resumption@of their invasion of Tibet.

group_1.textLeft: Word has it that more and more Mongolians@are converting to Heruka's devotion.

group_1.textRight: Yes, it's all true…

group_1.narration: "When someone can perform a feat like that@without any special training…@One is forced to recognize that the Master@was extraordinary from birth…"

group_1.textLeft: You don't want to admit it?

group_1.textRight: This isn't about how I feel…@It's about acknowledging the reality of things.
It's about recognizing her as the incarnation@of the Future Buddha, born to bring us salvation.

group_1.textLeft: ...Speaking of which, people also claim that@Heruka may be the Buddha himself...

group_1.textRight: It's all the same thing in the end…@Isn't Master the ultimate savior?

group_1.textLeft: There's no doubt that Heruka is special…
But she's still just the same old Heruka to me.
A scatterbrained sleepyhead and so very kind…

group_1.textRight: …Eventually you will need to return@to that nunnery.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:833300:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Me?

group_1.textRight: A connection with that nunnery will be essential@if we are to promote peace with the Mongols.
You and the Master are friends, which makes@you the right person for the job, yes?

group_1.textLeft: (This man… Is he trying to use Heruka@for his own ends?)
(As much as I want to sock him in the face…@this is what I've been waiting for.)
…On one condition.

group_1.textRight: And what might that be?

group_1.textLeft: I need you to pledge support for the nunnery.
[chara:833300:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yay! I did it!@I succeeded at last!

group_1.textRight: You did it?

group_1.textLeft: We've gotten financial support for the nunnery.
I mean, the Order of the White Hill is a very@rich sect, you know?
Now that we have this, we can all live@in peace now.

group_1.textRight: …You know, Dolma, I've been meaning@to tell you this…
But you do realize you're one of us now, yes?@And a valuable asset to the head priest at that…
I know you care deeply for the place where you@grew up, but you mustn't forget your mission.

group_1.textLeft: …My mission?

group_1.textRight: To make peace with the Mongols@and end the war.
Frankly, Heruka's cult is working towards@the opposite.

group_1.textLeft: That's not true…
Heruka is trying to protect everyone,@even at the cost of her own self.
She would never wage war.

group_1.textRight: I'm just saying it's a natural consequence of…
*Sigh…*@You truly do adore Lama Heruka, don't you?

group_1.textLeft: You wanna hear more about her?

group_1.textRight: Erm…that's not what I meant—

group_1.textLeft: So basically, Heruka…

group_1.textRight: [chara:833900:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Eurgh… There's no stopping her now…
